greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Heinz number of the differences plus one of the integer partition with Heinz number n.
comment: The Heinz number of an integer partition (y_1,...,y_k) is prime(y_1)*...*prime(y_k).
The only fixed point is 1 because otherwise the sequence decreases omega (A001222) by one.
example: The partition (3,2,2,1) with Heinz number 90 has differences plus one (2,1,2) with Heinz number 18, so a(90) = 18.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Apr 23 2019
